name: Vortex Vanquisher
description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
When your active character is protected by a Shield Character Status or a Shield Combat Status, you deal +1 DMG.
After the character uses an Elemental Skill: If you have a Combat Status that grants a Shield on your side, add 1 Shield point to that Combat Status. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The character deals +1 DMG</color>.\nWhen your active character is protected by a $[K6] Character Status or a $[K6] Combat Status, you deal +1 DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character uses an Elemental Skill:</color> If you have a Combat Status that grants a $[K6] on your side, add 1 $[K6] point to that Combat Status. (Once per Round)

(Once per Round)
